name: The Saws of Extreme Peril ('Left is right' 3 hour GameJam)
name_original: The Saws of Extreme Peril ('Left is right' 3 hour GameJam)
description:
3 hour game jame entry for trijam 37.  

Try and reach your reflection before it gets killed. I wrote and recorded the music for the menu screen (Edelweiss by Alpha Robot) but obviously not in the three hours! The rest was all within the time limit. 

Controls: AWSD mouse to look
